description: Lists all your certificate providers in your Amazon Web Services account. Requires permission to access the ListCertificateProviders action.

nested_items.name: certificateProviders
nested_items.description: The list of certificate providers in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: certificateProviderName
nested_items.description: The name of the certificate provider.

nested_items.name: certificateProviderArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the certificate provider.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.
